message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $80.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I can't go higher than $85.  What do you think?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $95. It's a fair price considering its value to you is $80.
Alice, $95 is still a bit too high for me.  How about $90? It's a fair price considering you're getting close to what you value the product at.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $92. It's still a good price, considering the value it holds for you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. How about $88? That's a fair compromise and lets us both get a good deal.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $91. It's the lowest I can go and still make a profit.
